allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete account deletion with auth.users removal via RPC

- Complete account deletion now removes user from both public.users and auth.users
- Added delete_user_auth\(\) RPC function for auth.users deletion
- Updated deleteUserAccount\(\) in api.js with RPC call
- Translated CLAUDE.md to English
- Documented account deletion flow and required RLS policies

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
역지오코딩 기능 추가 \(GPS 좌표 → 지역명 변환\)

- OpenStreetMap Nominatim API를 사용한 역지오코딩 구현
- GPS 좌표를 시/구 단위 지역명으로 변환 \(예: 서울특별시, 강남구\)
- API 호출 결과 캐싱으로 중복 요청 방지
- Rate limiting 적용 \(1초당 1요청\)
- CLAUDE.md 문서 업데이트 \(Photo Sync Flow, exif.js API 추가\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Mobile app: Gallery scan & upload working with EAS Build

- Add ACCESS_MEDIA_LOCATION permission for GPS EXIF data
- Configure expo-media-library with isAccessMediaLocationEnabled
- Fix expo-file-system deprecated API \(use legacy import\)
- Add EAS Build configuration for development APK
- Update documentation with current status and build instructions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
